query.default: SELECT DISTINCT EDoc, STUFF(( SELECT CONCAT(', ', cp.Name) FROM [dbo].[lenspec_Etalon_PowerOfAttorn1] as poa JOIN [dbo].[Sungero_Parties_Counterparty] as cp ON poa.Attorn = cp.Id WHERE poa.EDoc = main.EDoc ORDER BY EDoc FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'') as Names FROM [dbo].[lenspec_Etalon_PowerOfAttorn1] as main
